name: björkOUT
description:
[WARNING]: there is quite a lot of screenshake in this game.

Please turn up your sound. 

björkOUT is controlled with a mouse. Press escape for a menu. 

All sounds from the song "Pleasure is all Mine" by Björk, originally released on the album Medulla in 2004. "ball" image taken from Medulla's record label. For more info on Björk and Medulla, go to: björk.com
